data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Li, Xia, Zhang, Zhen, Wang, Hongbin, Wu, Wei, Cao, Peng, Zhang, Peiyi (2010): Tomicus armandii Li & Zhang (Curculionidae, Scolytinae), a new pine shoot borer from China. Zootaxa 2572: 57-64, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.197436
